website_summaries.verdict: A bacon-style dog treat made with real pork that dogs find irresistible.
pros: Healthy meat-and-nutrient-rich treats to reward good behavior
Comes in cheddar cheese flavor, too, which many dogs enjoy
cons: Limit your dog's treat intake to avoid excess weight gain

customer_reviews.title: Did not agree with my dog, will neither buy or recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients in this caused loose stools in my 6-1/2 year old Boston Terrier. Purchased because he has eaten this brand of food for his entire life and the dry square biscuits, by Blue Buffalo have always agreed with him, so we assumed this would be another quality product. I honestly do not want want to "clean up" after a dog that is beyond the puppy stage, so out they go. We make many donations to the local animal shelter and I won't even donate these to them.
customer_reviews.author: P.Verdecchia

customer_reviews.title: Moooold
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. I loved that they are made out of better ingredients than the Beggin Strips. However, I went to give my dog one today and it was covered in mold. I looked into the bag and the rest of them also had mold. Luckily (I guess) I grabbed the worst looking one or I wouldn't have noticed and would have fed it to my dog. I didn't know other people were having the same issue. This definitely needs addressed. The return window is closed so I am stuck with just throwing them away. I contacted Blue Buffalo, waiting to see what they say.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Daubenmire!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Initially gave these treats a five star rating. Bought two more from Amazon. Had no problem with first bag. Went to open second bag and there was mold (not good) on these treats. Ended up having to throw entire bag away. Waste of money and not cheap! Was not going to give my dog this after having discovered mold. Then I read reviews on this product and mold was found in many bags. Sorry, my dog may enjoy these treats but not going to give him moldy treats!
customer_reviews.author: sebastianlady

customer_reviews.title: My golden chow loves these.
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes this brand of bacon treats better than the Beggin Bits. The price of these on Amazon is a lot better than at Pet Smart. I will definitely buy again, just waiting for the weather to cool off some. The last bag I got didn't have the moisture bag in it and by the time I got to the bottom of the bag a few of the pieces were getting moldy. I ordered that bag when the temperature here was in the mid 90's. But I will still buy these again because I have had the same thing happen to treats bought locally at the store.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Dog hated these
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a trial as they are made from better ingredients than the Beggin Strips my dog loves. He knew something was amiss as he didn't grab the treat when first offered. After a second or two he took it, went out his doggie door and immediately came back in. I knew something was not good as he never takes his treats outside. I looked out the back door and he had just spit them out and came back in the house. I guess he didn't even want them in the house. Wow! Never done that before. Anyway, I'm sure other dogs love them... just not mine.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Olson

customer_reviews.title: White mold on Dog Treats
customer_reviews.text: White moldy coating on treats! I gave my dog a couple of them before seeing it on others in the bag. She actually had loose icky stools after eating them but okay now. I am very disappointed in this product. I bought them thinking they would be better for her then the Beggin' strips I'd been buying her. NOT! After unsuccessfully trying to find a number or even an email for Amazon customer service without paying $2.99, I am very dissatisfied with Amazon, too! How do I talk to someone to return this defective and potentially dangerous to my pet product? Not good!
customer_reviews.author: Daphne B

customer_reviews.title: Best dog treats around and great value too!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these in the bacon flavor for my dog for months now and they are hands down the BEST treats!!! I break them into smaller pieces and put them in her favorite treat dispensing toy each morning. This is also a GREAT VALUE! You cannot beat this price for a 15 oz bag. I was at a popular pet supply chain store recently and “on clearance” there were $15 a bag! I’ll continue to buy these on Amazon. My dog LOVES them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katara

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: My little dog is a picky eater, so, to encourage her to eat, I always mix her kibble with some toppings from Stella and Chewy; they are not cheap, for example, a 7 oz bag of bacon bits cost $25.99, so, when I saw the price of this product I figured that I could cut them into tiny bits to use as toppings. Well, it turned out to be a case of "you get what you pay for", my little dog simply refuses to eat when I mix her kibble with this treat. Forget about saving money, it's more important to have a happy dog.
customer_reviews.author: WeLovePhoenix

customer_reviews.title: Happy Puppy
customer_reviews.text: Before ordering I read the reviews. The biggest issue was the expiration date and possible mold. The good reviews swayed my order. As soon as they got here I checked the expiration date. In was over a year away. As soon as I opened the bag you could smell doggy deliciousness. I inspected the treats in the bag and they were all fresh, moist with not a trace of mold. Our Master likes them and he wants to order more when we run out.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Liston

customer_reviews.title: Strips were completely torn up into tiny pieces
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, three of my last deliveries have consisted of not strips, but tiny pieces with no long strips. I've been ordering these for a few years and have 4 dogs that look forward to these treats as a routine first thing in the morning and last treat at night. These are not usable at all. It's very disappointing to me and devastating to my 4 babies. I'm giving it one last try for this months delivery this weekend. Otherwise, I will go directly to the pet store for better quality edible strips.
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerCO

customer_reviews.title: My dog will do back flips for these treats :)
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves treats, period. But she goes crazy over these treats. I've never seen a dog so excited for treats. I hear her sometimes climbing over shoes and knocking stuff over trying to reach the bag for a sniff. I should post a video of her reaction just waiting for the bag to open. These treats are a winner, she gets a 1/2 strip. These really last a long-time and you get the best price for the larger bag than you can find in the store. Thanks Blue!
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these on Amazon with a coupon after seeing a commercial for them. I'm typically pretty happy with the ingredients in Blue products, so I thought I would give these a try. My dog LOVES them. She's even learned that they're called "Sizzlers," and gets really excited if we ask her if she wants a Sizzler. My only concern is that these are a little pricey, but I'll keep my eye out for coupons/sales and will absolutely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: happyfeet

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them, but use them quickly.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 dogs love these treats. I have never seen mold on them, however, I do see moisture form around them as I get to the bottom of the bag. It seems these treats may be hygroscopic, and attract water each time the bag is opened. This may be creating the right conditions for mold growth.
customer_reviews.author: Maid2worship

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, made in the USA. They are extremely economical compared to other dog treats. They also do not give my dogs (I have three) gas which other products do. These are now my go to treats & will purchase them for years to come (as long as the price stays the same).
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Nasty smell
customer_reviews.text: Although our dog loves these, the last bag had a nasty, acidic smell. Even our dog looked confused when I gave her a piece. It is not an expired item, nor does the bag look different than the previous bags, but I won't feed them to the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa-Oh

customer_reviews.title: Moldy Treats!!
customer_reviews.text: TREATS WERE COVERED WITH WHITE MOLD!!! Delivered on July 17th, opened and have been feeding my dog these new treats, only to discover this morning that the treats are covered with white mold at the bottom of the bag. Ordered two bags and I am afraid to use either bag since I discovered this. My dog has a sensitive stomach. I am greatly distressed by this discovery. I am living on a small fixed income, and have tried to keep my dog on the best. The expiration date says "Use by July 19, 2018". DO NOT Feed these treats to your dog. I am hoping I do ot end up at the vets with a sick dog.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Broxholme

customer_reviews.title: My Stubby dog  loves these treats.
customer_reviews.text: Stubby prefers/loves these Blue Buffalo Sizzler treats over all others he has tasted. I break these treats into 3/4 inch pieces and he gets a piece when ever I want him to come in the house, when I leave him home alone or when he needs to come get his collar put on.
customer_reviews.author: Cactus Wren

customer_reviews.title: Covered in mold!!
customer_reviews.text: These are one of my dogs absolute favorite treats. When I opened a new package I couldn't understand why she wouldn't touch them. Looked inside the bag and the entire contents were covered in mold. I would have returned them but my return window had closed. I wrote to Blue Buffalo and am waiting for their response. Even though my dog loves these I've lost my trust in them being safe.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Faye

customer_reviews.title: Great treats
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 small dogs and they love these treats! I’m careful what I give them because of skin allergies. This is a better price also rather than buying the small bags at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: I thought our dog was being a snob but no... moldy right after opening them!
customer_reviews.text: Was feeding these to my dog and she wasn't gobbling them up like she used to. After a few weeks I pulled out a strip that was covered in what I can only assume is white mold. No wonder she wasn't eating them right away! And of course, this was one of several bags of snacks we bought so I can't even try to return it... Horrible. I expected more from BLUE.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Moser

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering these. The first time no issue this time I noticed they expire in less than a month and they are all dried out and as some have pointed out some are molded
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: our puppies love it!
customer_reviews.text: We tried several treats and settled on the Blue Buffalo Sizzlers, actually our puppies decided for us. Given options they always go to the Sizzlers with great gusto!
customer_reviews.author: lowjohn

customer_reviews.title: I really want to try one...
customer_reviews.text: Haley goes berserk when she sees the bag. They smell and look like bacon and she loves them. It takes everything I have not to sample one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Miovech

customer_reviews.title: Smells strongly of smoke
customer_reviews.text: I suppose some dogs don't have a problem with the smell of smoke but my dogs must relate back to the wild. They will not eat anything that smells of smoke. Their instincts say to stay away from smoke and fire. So they will not touch this product. Sorry my husband talked me into buying this. He saw add on tv which said it was good for them but not if they won't eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rating downgraded because of expiration date
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that expiration date on these Sizzlers dog treats is 11/21/20 and I received them today, 10/12/20. I keep a bag of these treats in glove compartment of each car for extra tasty dog rewards, mostly after a vet visit, so these will expire well before finished (unless there are an awful lot of vet visits, which I sincerely hope not). The product itself is fine for its purpose and the dogs love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Better Treat for Good Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs go crazy for these treats, and I feel better about giving them something that isn't full of garbage grains. They identify the pork as being American, not Chinese, another win for our puppies. I am loyal to the Blue Buffalo brand, among a few others, for their being loyal to dog wellness.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: We exclusively feed our 8yo Puggle with a sensitive stomach ...
customer_reviews.text: We exclusively feed our 8yo Puggle with a sensitive stomach Blue Buffalo products. In the past he has had issues with diarrhea when he eats other brand dog treats, but with these he hasn't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid healthy ingrediants
customer_reviews.text: We used to give beggin' strips until we read the ingredients. A couple of years ago we switched to Sizzlers and have found that it does indeed agree better with our Bijon Frise/Maltese mixes. It is their night time treat that they like so much that we do not need to substitute any others because they never tire of them. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Barry

customer_reviews.title: Better alternative to grocery store brands
customer_reviews.text: My dogs used to love these, but last few times I purchased these, they don't seem to have same taste to them. Maybe they don't like the texture...not sure, but still buy them and they eventually eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: These treats gave my dog serious GI issues and caused him to pee in the house multiple times. We ended up bringing him to the vet and a $500 bill later had no answers. These treats are poisoning our pets. He has never had issues in the house and all of a sudden was pooping and peeing in the house every night. We stopped these treats and....surprise! He’s fine now. Absolutely do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: My doggie loves these tasty treats
customer_reviews.text: Great treat for my Cocapoo. He loves them! They last a long time if you give one or two/day. Easy to tear to make just the right size. Not a meal substitute. Only drawback is they don’t close all way, so fold top over and use a bag clip.
customer_reviews.author: GinGin

customer_reviews.title: Just might be the real thing, just ask the dog.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves these treats. Looks like bacon, smells like bacon....tastes like bacon.... Haven't done the taste test but the dog will do anything for these snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Gandyson

customer_reviews.title: Dog treats
customer_reviews.text: Neither of my dogs liked these. They run a great commercial, and ingredients are indeed better than the competition, but my girls said no. Of course they are spoiled, since I usually make my own treats for them. A follow-up to my earlier review - I gave these treats another chance because they have such a good ingredient list and I have a new dog. He doesn't like them either. I give up. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: azgayle

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Trying to eliminate grain from my dog's diet to deal with some itchy skin issues, and he loves these. They are great for when I am giving my other dog a bacon treat...the grain free one is just as popular with my itchy dog.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Product was fresh, very strong smell, my dog isn’t a fan
customer_reviews.text: Product seems fresh. It has a strong smell, maybe too strong. My dog wasn’t interested. My big issue, and this isn’t related to the product itself so it didn’t affect the rating i gave, was the ridiculous packaging. I included a photo of the massive box this was in. The box was literally larger than my kitchen sink and this bag of treats was the only thing in the box. Just more for my recycle bin!
customer_reviews.author: Cmwb

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES these treats, and I feel good giving them to her. They must be full of flavor because she just goes crazy for them. And they have a strong smell! I buy these again and again. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kms1990

customer_reviews.title: My dog can't get enough!
customer_reviews.text: My dog can't get enough of these. She loves it as much as real bacon.
customer_reviews.author: IAM Hall

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog LOVES these treats! She has food sensitivities and turns her nose up to many treats but LOVES these. In fact when the Amazon box arrives she tends to steal it just to take the bag and run away! The size of bag is larger than expected especially for the price which is incredible when it comes to pet treats! Blue Buffalo is an INCREDIBLE company that our Dog absolutely loves!
customer_reviews.author: MJ.Sell

customer_reviews.title: Fairly healthy treat.
customer_reviews.text: My 8lb chihuahua loves these treats. I break it into 1 inch pieces as I keep her on a diet to keep her weight down. Cost effective as a bag will last a month for her.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dog LadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Quality treat, dog approved!
customer_reviews.text: My dog gets these as a special treat. He loves them sooooo much! And I love that it's blue buffalo brand so I know that the quality ingredients are there (unlike other lower quality brands). Pleased with my purchase and will reorder when we run out.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Pup Still Prefers Beggin' Strips
customer_reviews.text: Bought as healthier (?) alternative to Beggin' Strips. Our 6-year old shih-tzu is really finicky eater. Comparing ingredients, the Sizzlers probably have an edge, but product tends to crumble and break-up way too much (lots of debris/trashbits in bag), and pup still prefers the Beggin' Strips when given choice.
customer_reviews.author: OlTex

customer_reviews.title: Love everything from Blue Buffalo and so does my lab ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is OBSESSED with these!!!! I can just pop open the bag and he comes running from wherever he is in the house. I've never seen him get so excited for a treat, except for the Blue Bones I also purchased. Love everything from Blue Buffalo and so does my lab - you can't go wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: they love it
customer_reviews.text: These are our dogs favorite treats. They are both about 10lbs, so they split 1 treat no more than once per day, so thr bag lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: The Couple

customer_reviews.title: Bacon Treats!!
customer_reviews.text: First time buying these and as soon as I opened the bag my dog came running. She loves these. Great price for the product. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bavila

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I got these through a promo coupon. My 15 year old dog loves them. Easy for him to chew and swallow. Just don’t give them too many or they won’t eat their supper!
customer_reviews.author: James Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: My picky eater
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this and he’s a very picky eater, I’ve tried him on other blue buffalo products and he has refused but these have won him over.
customer_reviews.author: Kasyl Kreative

customer_reviews.title: He loves them
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves these! He gets a treat when he comes in from going outside. Sometimes he fakes having to go potty just to get one. So funny!
customer_reviews.author: Daniels girl

customer_reviews.title: sort of good
customer_reviews.text: i do not like the smell of the snack, one of my dog ~girl eat it, but another dog dislike it, but if i give him real bacon, he love it
customer_reviews.author: ying anderson

customer_reviews.title: Generous size bag. Bacon style treats.
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES these treats. They are her favorite! I can feel good about feeding her these treats because Blue Buffalo cares about the ingredients that goes into them.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: Dogs go crazy over these. When I call out to the yard “house!” They come zooming inside and start their tricks before I even ask.
customer_reviews.author: craftylady

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Treats (better than Beggin Strips)
customer_reviews.text: One dog loves them, and the other is learning to love them. I always bought Beggin Strips. But when I saw on TV they were not that healthy, I got the Blue Sizzlers instead. No more Beggin Strips for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Louise L.

customer_reviews.title: dog loves them, keep the bag sealed
customer_reviews.text: Working on off-leash training with our dog, these things keep her attention incredibly well. (They actually smell pretty good to me, too.) The resealable bag is convenient too — it's important to keep it sealed when you are not using it, or they dry out.
customer_reviews.author: SGJ

customer_reviews.title: Pet Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Best product on the market to keep your pet healthy. Our dog loves them. Ingredients are far better for your Dog's health.
customer_reviews.author: HemiJack

customer_reviews.title: Healthy "bacon" chews
customer_reviews.text: We have been ordering these on subscription for months now. At least the last 2 orders received have had many small broken pieces. I do not know whether the fault is with Amazon shipping or Blue Buffalo, but I am going to seek an alternative that my dog will like and is healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I can't testify as to the taste - but both of mine seem to love them. I like that they're from Blue Buffalo
customer_reviews.text: SInce these are for my dogs, I can't testify as to the taste - but both of mine seem to love them. I like that they're from Blue Buffalo. Better for the dogs and they like them. What more could you want??
customer_reviews.author: Ad Astra

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love This
customer_reviews.text: My Pomeranians love these! One of them will go scratch on the cabinet and cry for it. Haha! It’s so cute!
customer_reviews.author: April R.

customer_reviews.title: Smoky Smell
customer_reviews.text: My dogs didn't like the smoky scent and would not eat it. Gave to a friend with dogs that are not finicky.
customer_reviews.author: Lizard

customer_reviews.title: Dog Turned His Nose Up at this product!
customer_reviews.text: My dog refuses to eat them.. don't know why but certain things he just will not put in his mouth... guess I won't be buying the dog food. This was a trail to switch him to grain free but after reading the ingredients it seems there is some grain used in making this product.
customer_reviews.author: James G

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These are soooo much better for your dog than traditional bacon treats and my dogs LOVE THEM!!!! I also want to say I ordered 4 bags and they are so much fresher and softer than the same size bags at the pet store. Such a better price too. 100% recommend! All Paws up from my happy weenie!!!
customer_reviews.author: Syd

customer_reviews.title: Dog treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes these treats. I like them due to price and amount I get.
customer_reviews.author: mojo

customer_reviews.title: First rate dog treats
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has gluten, chicken and beef allergies. She only eats Blue Buffalo food and she loves Blue Buffall treats
customer_reviews.author: David Lyster

customer_reviews.title: love blue buffalo but these were disappointing
customer_reviews.text: every single one of the sizzlers were broken, some in tiny pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Briggie

customer_reviews.title: My dogs both hesitated before eating these. Then shortly ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs both hesitated before eating these. Then shortly after they started throwing up have never had this problem with any treat I have given them will never buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Marie Chavez

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell you about the flavor because they're for my DOG!
customer_reviews.text: They smell terrible but she lives them so I guess they have a good "flavor."
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Great value! I got 6 big full size bags of these treats. My chihuahua/terrier mix absolutely loves these. They are easy for him to chew and the ingredients are high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: must buy!
customer_reviews.text: every shipment of the product has been of great quality. dogs love them, a million times better than beggin strips, for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Fortier

customer_reviews.title: Yummy bacon treats
customer_reviews.text: Smells good. My senior dog loves it. Big bag and generous amount of bacon treats inside
customer_reviews.author: Quang

customer_reviews.title: Healthy reward treats.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves these. Would do just about any command for one. I feel safe feeding these to him. He is a German Shepherd.
customer_reviews.author: Glee

customer_reviews.title: dog loved them
customer_reviews.text: I have a picky eater (golden doodle) and he loved these!
customer_reviews.author: L Carle McEvoy

customer_reviews.title: my dog loves these.
customer_reviews.text: We break these up and use them as smaller training treats. My dog loves them.
customer_reviews.author: rufiaclimbs

customer_reviews.title: Just OK.
customer_reviews.text: My dog wasnt impressed. She is iffy about eating these and when she does east them, they make her poop a lot. Probably wont order again.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Better size and ingredients than Beggin' Strips.
customer_reviews.text: These treats are slightly shorter, but without red dye, are healthier for my dog. They are also easier to break apart for training purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R.

customer_reviews.title: My pickey dog likes this.
customer_reviews.text: If my spoiled dog likes this then it must be good!
customer_reviews.author: Scot

customer_reviews.title: Sizzlers
customer_reviews.text: Our Shorlie loves them. Pricey but we love to pamper him! We had been giving him Beggin Strips but recently switched after reading the product list and decided to give the Sizzlers a try.
customer_reviews.author: Leneda Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Big Treat for Little Dog
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves them. A nice healthy treat. When we found out that some of the treats we were buying had Glycol in the ingredients, we switched immediately. Glycol is a compound used in Antifreeze which is harmful to Dogs. Blue Sizzlers treats have better ingredients for the health of the dog.
customer_reviews.author: HemiJack

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog mom
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these and this huge bag is going to last my chihuahua forever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love These
customer_reviews.text: My dogs go crazy for these bacon treats from Blue Buffalo. I like that they don't have artificial color in them. It's a nice big package too.
customer_reviews.author: G. Night

customer_reviews.title: Fur kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate the flavor on a personal basis, but our fur kid and others love them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: My mommy buys these for me.  I get a small piece when I'm a good girl... so I try real hard.
customer_reviews.text: I cook my dogs food..we eat reg beef and chicken, but she gets organic and onky Blue treats.
customer_reviews.author: rocky girl

customer_reviews.title: Not sure!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very picky Shih Tzu. Some days she will eat these and other days she will have nothing to do with them.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Herron

customer_reviews.title: Great treats!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love your products! I was giving my dog the bacon treats that are in the supermarket, until I read the ingredients! Yikes! I wouldn't feed those treats to a dumpster, never mind a family pet. Thankfully I found your bacon treats. Ingredients l can pronounce and understand, plus my dog goes bonkers for it! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: NYCGrrl

customer_reviews.title: My dog liked them.
customer_reviews.text: Would not hold shape. They crumbled into very small pieces. I'm going back to beggin strips.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Make sure that the product is mold/fungus free after you ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure that the product is mold/fungus free after you open the bag before you decid to give one to your dog(s). Product has an expiration date of 06/20/2018, but this is ridiculous! I ordered this product after seeing a commercial about it, and thinking twice about continuing to give my dogs Beggin' Strips, but I will NEVER purchase this item again!
customer_reviews.author: djamo

customer_reviews.title: Usually have good luck with Blue Buffalo
customer_reviews.text: Actually a Christmas for my granddogs, but when opened today it was covered in mold! GROSS!! Expiration date is June 2018. Usually have good luck with Blue Buffalo, but not this!! Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: wildthang

customer_reviews.title: Poor seal at seams of package!!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all!!!! Package arrived and no damage to large envelope! Opened envelope and bottom of Blue Sizzlers Bacon Style Dog Treats had hole on both sides of package!! Treats inside HARD AS A ROCK!! Never again!!
customer_reviews.author: Lobbydon

customer_reviews.title: The ingredience are far superior than Beggin strips which is trash
customer_reviews.text: Dog will eat it but not crazy about it. The ingredience are far superior than Beggin strips which is trash. I wish my dog was as crazy about these however...
customer_reviews.author: jspencer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs favorite
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these and never gets tired of flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Baros

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice treat and it does not have the chemical colors included in other treats
customer_reviews.author: Rookie

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my dog's favorite treat! I'm so glad it's made with good ingredients and not "junk" food
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: My dogs favorite but moldy before it's time
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. So much so that I reordered several bags earlier today. I would have given them 5 stars but as I was getting to the bottom of the bag I noticed that most of them are moldy. The best by date is Jan 2018. I canceled my order and will take my chances at the pet store where I can return faulty items.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy

customer_reviews.title: It's bacon!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. All his treats are from Blue
customer_reviews.author: Fitz Roy

customer_reviews.title: #1 dog treats
customer_reviews.text: Lots of treats. Both dogs love them. Wouldnt be a bad treat during the apocalypse
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Blakesley

customer_reviews.title: Grain free dog treats
customer_reviews.text: I buy these because my dog has allergies. She loves them and they are better for her.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy K

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES these treats and I feel good about what I'm feeding him
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES these treats and I feel good about what I'm feeding him. They're a great alternative to other brands that make bacon-like treats. We've had great luck with Blue products and will continue to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Lyons

customer_reviews.title: No snacks for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: Vet said no snacks for our dog. That is what this is.
customer_reviews.author: James Heckenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Good product, shipping can be iffy
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes they come a little crumbled from being shipped but they are healthier than their beggin' strips counterparts. My dog loves them but he's not very picky when it comes to food.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product work good
customer_reviews.text: these seem to be what the dog wants as and in between trip
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Syddall

customer_reviews.title: Your dogs new favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie / Trixie gives us the intense stare daily, it means she wants a SIZZLERS, these must be the best "beggin strip" type treat ever She loves them over all over snacks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bacon makes everything better!
customer_reviews.text: When I say "bacon" my girls come running! These came a day early and my precious pups were so happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grayfox

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Dogs tolerate them but don't love them. They are probably better quality and better for the dogs than the run of the mill brands, but if the dogs won't eat them, then what's the point.
customer_reviews.author: JKH

product_meta.title: Blue Buffalo Sizzlers Natural Bacon-Style Soft-Moist Dog Treats
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Original Pork| Size:15 ozMade with real pork, Blue Buffalo Sizzlers with Real Pork Bacon-Style Dog Treats are so close to the real thing that your best buddy will never know the difference! We know the sounds and smells of bacon sizzling in the pan are sure to attract our canine companions. Now you can share the authentic taste of bacon without all the fillers and artificial flavorings of the other brands.
feature_bullets: USA PORK FIRST: BLUE Sizzlers start with real USA pork as the first ingredient making them a truly irresistible dog treat.
BACON-STYLE DOG TREATS: For dogs that love a meaty treat, BLUE Sizzlers have a soft-moist texture just like the real thing!

WHOLESOME INGREDIENTS: These bacon style dog treats don’t contain any chicken (or poultry) by-product meals and are free from corn, wheat and soy. Plus, they’re free from artificial preservatives like BHA and colors like red dye 40.
HEALTHY DOG TREATS: Blue Buffalo natural dog treats feature the healthy, wholesome ingredients you’ll love feeding as much as they’ll love eating.
Contains (1) 15-oz bag of BLUE Sizzlers Natural Bacon-Style Soft-Moist Dog Treats, Original Pork
